channel.title: Need help on this funPKzone tutorial!
channel.description:
Hey, I'm having some problems doing this tut :|
http://www.google/showthread.php?t=32644
^^Please replace the google with rune*dash*server.org^^
Umm, it doesn't say (On the tut), but is it possible to use this while also having a normal pking zone? Because it tells me to delete the remove item stuff in applydead so I thought that would affect the normal pking...
And also the part where it says:
Ok, to that we're going to add this:
if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true && (!WHATYOUPUTFORTHENAMEOFYOURCOORDSHERE())) {
What does that mean? He didn't explain well enough... Under the other thing, or add a complete new 1? or what???
Please help :D

item.title: Need help on this funPKzone tutorial!
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Hey, I’m having some problems doing this tut

http://www.google/showthread.php?t=32644

^^Please replace the google with runedashserver.org^^

Umm, it doesn’t say (On the tut), but is it possible to use this while also having a normal pking zone? Because it tells me to delete the remove item stuff in applydead so I thought that would affect the normal pking…

And also the part where it says:

Ok, to that we’re going to add this:

if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true && (!WHATYOUPUTFORTHENAMEOFYOURCOORDSHERE())) {

What does that mean? He didn’t explain well enough… Under the other thing, or add a complete new 1? or what???

Please help

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on this funPKzone tutorial!
